captions.text:
I'm sitting alone in
The sofa where you used to sit

I couldn't sleep at all
And I keep staring at the door
Wondering if you'd come

Even if I close my eyes and 
Ears the memories come back to me

Will the heart stop if stop breathing
Just the loneliness towards you comes back

There is no more you in the
Sofa where you used to be
It's only me left

I'm waiting for you
So far from me, you're so far away

There are only dusts of regrets
left, and I'm waiting for you

I couldn't fill it up by myself
The loneliness that filled the room
Can't be held in my heart

Yes that string of hope
Makes it harder to sit here by myself

Even if I try to get away
I'm looking for you again

There is no more you in the
Sofa where you used to be
It's only me left

I'm waiting for you
So far from me, you're so far away

There are only dusts of regrets
left, and I'm waiting for you

I can't fall asleep all night long
Until the end of time

Even if I try emptying 
You out

There is no more you in the
Sofa where you used to be
It's only me left

I'm waiting for you
So far from me, you're so far away

There are only dusts of regrets
left, and I'm waiting for you

comments.text:
Wow, it kinda pisses me off that people are saying Jungkook's version is 
better. I like BTS but no, just no. Jungkook has a good voice, I'm not 
gonna deny that at all. It's sad to say but I'm sure if Crush looked like 
Jungkook a lot of these girls would say Crush's version is better (though I 
personally find Crush good looking). I'm here to say I WAY prefer Crush's 
ORIGINAL. I wish he could be as widely popular like Jungkook.

comments.text:
i think (or at least i hope) most of the people that said that maybe wanted 
to say they prefer jungkook's version? i personally enjoy jungkook's cover 
more than the original but that's because 1. it was the first time i 
listened to the song so i got used to jk's version and 2. i'm in love with 
his (jk's) voice. maybe other bangtan fans feel that way too.

p.s. i don't actually think that his cover /is better/ than crush lmao 
that's just silly.
comments.author: calu kim

comments.text:
I love KR&B, I hope it can get more love from international fans. Covers 
are fun, and they can bring attention to artists that are lesser known 
outside of Korea. It makes me sad that my bias group doesn't do covers 
anymore, I think my biases can do R&B well (hardcore inspirit). It's okay 
to have preferences, if you prefer the cover say so in the comment section 
under the cover, don't do it here under the original artist's MV. It's only 
common courtesy.
